Name: Lewis Carroll's Alice
About the game: Lewis Carroll's Alice is a short interactive narrative game based on the classic English 1865 children's book, Alice's Adventures in Wonderland, by Lewis Carroll. This game features Sir John Tenniel's original illustrations. A young girl named Alice falls through a rabbit hole into a fantasy world of anthropomorphic creatures. Experience an interactive retelling of the classic tale by taking control of Alice in key moments, such as when Alice follows the White Rabbit down the rabbit hole. Relive the original story and enjoy activities across a wide assortment of fun and relaxing mini-games, including croquet, swimming in the pool of tears, playing catch with a giant puppy, painting white roses red, and more.
